trans-unit.source: Using Tab Expansion
trans-unit.target: 使用选项卡扩展

trans-unit.source: powershell,cmdlet
trans-unit.target: powershell,cmdlet

trans-unit.source: Using Tab Expansion
trans-unit.target: 使用选项卡扩展

trans-unit.source: Command-line shells often provide a way to complete the names of long files or commands automatically, speeding up command entry and providing hints.
trans-unit.target: Command-line Shell 通常提供一种方法来自动完成长文件或命令的名称，从而加快命令输入并给出提示。

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell allows you to fill in file names and cmdlet names by pressing the **Tab** key.
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell 允许通过按下 **Tab** 键来填充文件名称和 cmdlet 名称。

trans-unit.source: Tab expansion is controlled by the internal function TabExpansion.
trans-unit.target: 选项卡扩展由内部函数 TabExpansion 控制。

trans-unit.source: Since this function can be modified or overridden, this discussion is a guide to the behavior of the default Windows PowerShell configuration.
trans-unit.target: 由于此函数可被修改或覆盖，所以此讨论可用作针对默认 Windows PowerShell 配置的行为的指导。

trans-unit.source: To fill in a filename or path from the available choices automatically, type part of the name and press the **Tab** key.
trans-unit.target: 若要从可用选择中自动填充文件名或路径，键入部分名称并按下 **Tab** 键。

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell will automatically expand the name to the first match that it finds.
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell 将自动将名称扩展至找到的第一个匹配项。

trans-unit.source: Pressing the **Tab** key repeatedly will cycle through all of the available choices.
trans-unit.target: 重复按下 **Tab** 将循环浏览所有可用选择。

trans-unit.source: The tab expansion of cmdlet names is slightly different.
trans-unit.target: cmdlet 名称的选项卡扩展稍有不同。

trans-unit.source: To use tab expansion on a cmdlet name, type the entire first part of the name (the verb) and the hyphen that follows it.
trans-unit.target: 若要在 cmdlet 名称上使用选项卡扩充，键入名称的整个第一部分（即谓词），然后是后跟的连字符。

trans-unit.source: You can fill in more of the name for a partial match.
trans-unit.target: 你可以填入名称的更多内容以进行部分匹配。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you type **get-co** and then press the **Tab** key, Windows PowerShell will automatically expand this to the **Get-Command** cmdlet (notice that it also changes the case of letters to their standard form).
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你键入 **get-co** 然后按下 **Tab** 键，Windows PowerShell 将自动将其扩展为 **Get-Command** cmdlet（注意，还会将字母的大小写改为标准形式）。

trans-unit.source: If you press **Tab** key again, Windows PowerShell replaces this with the only other matching cmdlet name, **Get-Content**.
trans-unit.target: 如果你再次按下 **Tab**，Windows PowerShell 会将此替换为另一个唯一的匹配的 cmdlet 名称，**Get-Content**。

trans-unit.source: You can use tab expansion repeatedly on the same line.
trans-unit.target: 你可以在同一行上重复使用选项卡扩展。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use tab expansion on the name of the **Get-Content** cmdlet by entering:
trans-unit.target: 例如，你可以通过输入以下内容在 **Get-Content** cmdlet 的名称上使用选项卡扩展：

trans-unit.source: When you press the **Tab** key, the command expands to:
trans-unit.target: 当你按下 **Tab** 键时，该命令扩展为：

trans-unit.source: You can then partially specify the path to the Active Setup log file and use tab expansion again:
trans-unit.target: 然后你可以部分指定“智能安装”日志文件的路径并再次使用选项卡扩展：

trans-unit.source: When you press the **Tab** key, the command expands to:
trans-unit.target: 当你按下 **Tab** 键时，该命令扩展为：

trans-unit.source: One limitation of the tab expansion process is that tabs are always interpreted as attempts to complete a word.
trans-unit.target: 选项卡扩展进程的一个限制是选项卡始终解释为尝试完成单词。

trans-unit.source: If you copy and paste command examples into a Windows PowerShell console, make sure that the sample does not contain tabs; if it does, the results will be unpredictable and will almost certainly not be what you intended.
trans-unit.target: 如果你将命令示例复制并粘贴到 Windows PowerShell 控制台，请确保该示例不包含选项卡；如果包含选项卡，则结果不可预测并且几乎不会得到你预期的结果。
